mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_article (author_id, title, caption, file_nm) VALUES (#{author_id}, #{title}, #{caption}, #{file_nm})
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, u.nm AS author_nm FROM t_article AS a JOIN t_user AS u ON a.author_id = u.id WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT t.id, t.nm, t.slug FROM t_tag AS t JOIN t_article_tag AS a ON t.id = a.tag_id WHERE a.article_id = #{id} ORDER BY t.order_no
